titles.title: A bill to amend the Head Start Act to require parental consent for nonemergency intrusive physical examinations.
A bill to amend the Head Start Act to require parental consent for nonemergency intrusive physical examinations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Amends the Head Start Act to require Head Start agencies to obtain written parental consent before administration of any non-emergency intrusive physical examination of a child in connection with participation in a Head Start program.
